definition: any of numerous relatively small elongated soft-bodied animals especially of the phyla Annelida and Chaetognatha and Nematoda and Nemertea and Platyhelminthes, to move in a twisting or contorted motion, especially when struggling
details:
noun
- any of numerous relatively small elongated soft-bodied animals especially of the phyla Annelida and Chaetognatha and Nematoda and Nemertea and Platyhelminthes
- screw thread on a gear with the teeth of a worm wheel or rack
- a software program capable of reproducing itself that can spread from one computer to the next over a network
= example: a software program capable of reproducing itself that can spread from one computer to the next over a network
- a person who has a nasty or unethical character undeserving of respect
= synonyms: louse, insect, dirt ball
verb
- to move in a twisting or contorted motion, especially when struggling
= example: to move in a twisting or contorted motion, especially when struggling
= synonyms: twist
